ygData.subject: Banded mold availability in Queynos Hills
ygData.msgSnippet: I d like everyone who can to check out the small house on the road to Surefall Glade in Queynos Hills. The male vendor in the house SHOULD have a full
ygData.messageBody:
I'd like everyone who can to check out the small house on the road to Surefall Glade in Queynos Hills. The male vendor in the house SHOULD have a full complement of medium banded molds as well as sheet metal. Please post the results of your survey to the list. Apparently, the vendor in E'ci has had his items replaced with the normal food/water/junk vending list. Tarew Marr server (sp?) supposedly still has the normal supplies on this guy, so maybe it's just E'ci that's hosed? If your vendor doesn't have his molds and metal, immediately /petition a GM on your server to investigate the trouble.

Thank you,

Araman, 19th level Paladin
Warwinds of Norrath, E'ci
Skill 143 Blacksmith, out-of-work until this is fixed
madoc1@...
